result.execSummary:
The defendant Harley Dean Stands was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Harley Dean Stands is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Harley Dean Stands was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Harley Dean Stands was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

supervisions.notes: Jail credit for 5 days only if revoked.

miscConds.notes:
The defendant must maintain/obtain full time employment/school that consists of at least 35 hrs/week.

When not full time employed/school, the defendant must apply for at least 3 jobs per week and report progress monthly to P&P with pertinent information in regards to applications.  The defendant must only apply for jobs qualified for - must accept any job offered - must not engage in any conduct that could result in the termination of his/her employment/school.
No consumption or possession of alcohol & no entering upon the premises of any bars or taverns.
The defendant must cooperate with the State in prosecution of Kevin Wagnitz for the offenses related to the allegations in this case.
The defendant must undergo an AODA assessment and follow thru with all recommendations.

timeConds.notes: Defendant must perform a total of 200 hours of community service by performing 100 hours each year.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes:
Conditions of probation same as in Count #5, except no additional community service.
Concurrent with: Count #5

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Harley Dean Stands

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: granted - no Amended JOC prepared - copy faxed to DOC

Defendant Harley Dean Stands in court with attorney Jeffery Joy.  Charles James Simono appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called at 1:49 PM. Also called 15CF18. State - resolved - 15CF18 - amend only count to county ordinance of bail jumping with $1000 fine plus costs totalling $1464.50; 14CF123 - plead G/NC to counts #5 and #10 (#1, #2, #3, #4, #6, #7, #8 and #9), all other counts dismissed outright, withhold sentence and place on probation for 2 years with conditions of: AODA, absolute sobriety, no possession of alcohol and no entry into any taverns, bars, or similar establishments, employment/school, 200 hours of community service, cooperate with State in prosecution against Kevin Wagnitz (companion case) - describes cooperate. Court gives its interpretation of cooperation. Joy and Stands agree. Court amends count #1 on 15CF18 to county ordinance of bail jumping, pleads NC, finds G, fine of $1000.00 plus costs totalling $1464.50 - take bond from 14CF123 and then transfer remaining bond back to 14CF123. Stands pleads NC to counts #5 and #10 on 14CF123. Court dismisses counts #1, #2, #3, #4, #6, #7, #8, and #9. Court has plea questionnaire, goes thru it, finds the defendant has freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his constitutional rights and right to JT, accepts pleas, adjudges guilty, proceed to sentencing. State makes final argument prior to sentencing - follow joint recommendation. Joy makes final argument prior to sentencing - follow joint recommendation. Stands withholds comment. Court sentences the defendant to the following: counts #5 and #10 - withhold sentence and place on probation for 2 years, concurrent to each other, with conditions of: AODA and follow thru, no possession or consumption of alcohol and no entry into any taverns or bars, maintain/obtain full time employment/school, 200 hours of community service total by performing 100 hours each year, cooperate with State in prosecution of Kevin Wagnitz for the offenses related to the allegations in this case - describes cooperate, costs on each count (including DNA surcharge) - take remainder of bond left on 15CF18 and remainder of fines due thru probation, credit for 5 days only if revoked, right to appeal, adjourned.
Final pre-trial on February 25, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Called at 11:03 AM. Harley Stands appears in person and with counsel Jeff Joy. State appears by Charles Simono. Joy has Information, waives reading, enters NG pleas to all counts. Court continues bond, accepts plea, set for FPT on 2/25/15 at 1:15 pm.

Called at 3:52 PM. Harley Stands appears in person and with counsel Jeff Joy. State appear by Jodie Bednar-Clemens. State calls Deputy Hujet. Hujet sworn in at 3:53 PM. Direct exam by State. Record reflects proper identification of the defendant (3:58 PM). Cross exam by Joy at 4:00 PM. Re-direct by State at 4:05 PM. State offers exhibits #1 and #2 (4:05 PM). Court receives both exhibits after no objections (4:06 PM). Hujet excused at 4:07 PM. State calls Sgt. Crum. Crum sworn in at 4:08 PM. Direct exam by State. Cross exam by Joy at 4:12 PM. Crum excused at 4:16 PM. State makes argument - asks Court to find probable cause. Joy makes statement - asks Court not to find probable cause. Court finds probable cause that a felony may have been committed, binds over for trial. State files Information that mirrors complaint. Joy has Information. Court continues bond, set for ARGN on 1/7/15 at 10:00 AM.
and Certificate of Appearance - Deputy Sheriff WH

Preliminary hearing on December 11, 2014 at 02:15 pm.

Called at 1:38 PM. Harley Stands appears in person and with counsel Jeff Joy. State appears by Jodie Bednar-Clemens. Joy and Stands handed complaint in court, reviews it with his client, waives formal reading, requests PH but will waive time limits. Court considers time limits waived, continues bond, set for FPT on 12/11/14 at 2:15 PM.

Called 1:14 pm. Stands appears via video from FOSO. Attorney Jeff Joy via phone. State appears by Charles Simono. Joy's motion to reduce bond, makes statement. State clarifies what the charges may be and statement that were made by defendant on the day of arrest. court questions defendant. Joy is asking for $1500 cash. State requests conditions of no consumption of alcohol. No contact with Kevin Wagnitz. Court modifies to $1500 cash with conditions as stated by state. Set for INIT 10/1/14 at 1:30 pm. Adj.
No consumption of alcohol. No contact with Kevin Wagnitz.
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bail
